name: The Last Night (itch) (Jonas Pfeiffer)
description:
Change the color of the environment and see the rooms in a fresh light. Some things are only visible in one shade, others disappear.

At you last night, you leave your home and thoughts behind. What was it like? What will you remember? What will you take along?



CONTROLS:
WASD for Movement
Left Mouse for interacting

Music by  Chris Zabriskie.
Art and Programming by me.
